tooltip.mcrgb.shift_prompt: Hold SHIFT to view color info
ui.mcrgb.refresh_info: Click me after changing resource packs or adding mods! ðŸ˜€
tooltip.mcrgb.always_show_in_tooltips: Controls whether color info is displayed in item tooltips outside of the color picker UI.
tooltip.mcrgb.slider_constant_update: Set this to 'Update After Scrolling' if you experience stuttering/lag while using RGB sliders.
tooltip.mcrgb.give_command:
The command MCRGB will use to give you items.
The following delimiters will be substituted for the respective fields:
%p - Player Name
%i  - Item ID
%c - Item Components
%q - Quantity

Useful on servers with custom commands.
tooltip.mcrgb.bypass_op: Bypass checks for creative mode and operator status when giving items to the player. Useful on servers with custom permissions.
warning.mcrgb.noclothconfig: Cloth Config is required to access settings in-game. Edit the config.json manually or install Cloth Config.
